ygData.subject: RE: Level 43 Song
ygData.msgSnippet: i was wondering too.  i have been using this song a lot lately.  our mana regens a lot faster than i thought, and 300dmg AE is a nice little bard harm touch.
ygData.messageBody:
i was wondering too. i have been using this song a lot lately. our mana
regens a lot faster than i thought, and 300dmg AE is a nice little bard harm
touch. in fact i think our mana regens faster than an SK's cycle time for
HT. now the first time i used it, i saw did not see my health go down, i
could have been too far away. the second time, i thought i saw my health go
down, but it was definitely not for 300dmg, as i was only down about 150hp.
the third time, on the ghoul lord, i definitely nailed him for 300 dmg. i
know i was very close to him as he was walking away, because the song
knocked me back several feet when i cast it, but my health definitely did
not go down. 300dmg would have been a bubble and i know i did not lose
that.

also, though 300dmg doesn't seem like a lot, it most certainly saved my ass
on the ghoul lord that night. we had a group that had no business taking on
the lord and 2 boks. 3 clerics, 2 warriors, 1 bard. well when it was all
over everyone was dead, but with the dirge doing 300dmg to the lord (the
above example was a different time) and fear scaring the 2 boks away at the
end of the fight, the last person standing was me right after the only other
person left, one of the warriors, looted the ykesha and died.

Shada D'ukal, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
Erisi Dlarit, Level 24 High Elf Paladin
Tyria Sarkin, Level 22 High Elf Wizard
Mithaniel Marr Server


> From: Greg Gillan <GGillan@...>
>

> hurts us when we
> cast it?

> recent patches, or
> am I hallucinating?
>
>
> Elwyn Heartstring
> Level 44 Bard
> Erollisi Marr
